Nerangs.ab: digar dast-e avar gāv nahāde yā gusfand va yaθā ahū vairiiō goftan va yasnəmca tā sar āfrīnāmi gə̄uš tašne gə̄uš urune tauua gə̄uš huδā̊ŋhō urune se tā har kodām be-vāǧ gerefte bāšand ān vāǧ beguyad pas andar yazešgāh bordan moḥkam nahādan pas durtar āyad yek aṣ̌əm vohū goftan ahmāi raēsca tās sar hazaŋhrəm se bār tā sar jasa.mē tā sar aṣ̌əm vohū yek goftan

"Further, he has to recite two Yaθā ahū vairiiō with the hand put on the cow or the sheep and then yasnəmca until the end āfrīnāmi (with the šnūman) gə̄uš tašne gə̄uš urune tauua gə̄uš huδā̊ŋhō urune, one of the three ones -- they should say the vāǧ that they have taken (at the beginning). Then, he should bring it to the yazešngāh and place it. Then, he should go further and say one Aṣ̌əm Vohū and ahmāi raēsca until the end and three times hazaŋhrəm until the end. He should recite one Aṣ̌əm Vohū."
yaθā ahū vairiiō do goftan yasnəmca v. aō. z. āf. gə̄uš tašne gə̄uš urune tā sar ǧāmdān moḥkam kardan be ǧāy nahādan va vāǧ tamām goftan
"He should recite two Yaθā ahū vairiiō and yasnəmca v. aō. z. āf. gə̄uš tašne gə̄uš urune until the end. He should put the ǧāmdān, put it at its place and complete the vāǧ."
